Trade/Device Name(s): Safety Push Button Blood Collection Set
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Safety Push Button Blood Collection Set intended for blood specimen collection with needle stick safety features
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for insertion into a patient's vascular system for blood specimen collection, allows blood sampling with syringe or short-term (up to 2 hours) single infusions, features active safety to prevent accidental needle stick, single-use, and must remain under clinician supervision.
